description: The House of Lords permits government to negotiate over rights without the islands' consent.
title: UK fishing powers 'trample' on Crown dependencies
title_page: UK fishing powers 'trample' on Crown dependencies - BBC News
maintext: "Should any future government seek to extend this act without our consent, or make any attempt to legislate without our consent, that would be contrary to our important and historic constitutional relationship with the Crown and would offend democratic principles," he said.
